spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout does not match the 2D plan. The 2D plan has distinct zones (kitchen top-left, dining top-right, living right/bottom) plus an enclosed bathroom at center and stair block at left; the 3D render depicts essentially one open room with a stair opening and no correct room partitioning. Kitchen is placed on the right wall instead of top-left (E2), bathroom is not a separate enclosed room and is placed along the left wall (E2/E1), and dining/living areas are not spatially defined as in plan (E2/E1). Entrance/door locations do not correspond to the bottom-center entrance shown in plan (E2/E1). Window count/placement is largely incorrect (E2/E1). Room proportions and relative sizes between kitchen/dining/living are not preserved (E4).

structural_fidelity.notes: Key architectural structure from the plan is missing or altered. The bathroom enclosure/walls are missing (E1) and adjacency relationships (kitchen adjacent to dining along top, bathroom central, stairs left) are not respected (E2). The stair is modeled as a central open void with railing, unlike the plan's stair block on the left (E2/E5). Door embedding/orientation is not faithful: an interior door on the upper wall appears in 3D but the plan’s door positions (including bottom entrance and bathroom door) are not matched (E2/E3). No evidence of correct wall thickness logic relative to the plan; internal partitions are largely absent (E1).

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture/fixtures do not map to the plan. The plan implies separate dining and living spaces; the 3D adds a dining table/chairs but without corresponding room boundaries (E2). Bathroom fixtures appear in open space and not inside the small central bathroom (E2). Kitchen cabinetry/appliances are not arranged as the plan suggests (E2). Scale is stylized and not dimensionally tied to the 16'x12' kitchen and 13'x24' living proportions (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is visually clean and readable with coherent lighting and consistent stylized geometry. Isometric viewpoint is acceptable, though the representation is more diorama-like than an accurate architectural isometric/orthographic translation of the plan (minor projection fidelity penalty). Minimal rendering artifacts; good composition, but architectural clarity suffers due to missing partitions.

detected_errors.description: Missing enclosed central bathroom room/walls shown in the 2D plan; 3D shows bathroom fixtures without an actual bathroom enclosure.
Kitchen location is incorrect: plan places kitchen at top-left; 3D places full kitchen run on the right wall.
Missing distinct dining room and living room spatial separation/placement as indicated in the plan (dining top-right, living right/bottom).
Stair placement and configuration are incorrect: plan shows stair block on the left; 3D depicts a central stair void/opening with railing.
Hallucinated railing/open-void stair feature not represented in the 2D plan’s stair enclosure.
Main entrance at bottom-center (plan) is not represented correctly in 3D; no matching entrance door at the corresponding location.
Door placement does not match the plan (e.g., a door appears on the back wall in 3D that does not correspond to the plan’s shown exterior/interior door positions).
Door orientation/swing logic cannot be reconciled with the plan due to missing partitions and mismatched door locations.
Missing most windows indicated in the plan (multiple openings along bottom and right walls, plus top openings); 3D shows only a single window.
Window placement is incorrect relative to the plan’s window/door distribution; the lone 3D window does not correspond to the plan’s opening pattern.
Proportions of major areas (kitchen 16'x12', living 13'x24) are not preserved; 3D reads as a single similarly sized space without correct dimensional hierarchy.
